title: Hextech Annie Question
body:
So I'm aware I need 10 purple crystals to craft Hextech Annie, what I want to know is if I purchase the Augment + Bundle box for 2950, what does that 10x + Crystal icon mean?

Does that mean I get 10 purple crystals with the possibility of more crystals guaranteed in that box?

I'm not super good at League of Legends, but I would just like a response on what little information I am given from the game itself, because clicking on it doesn't explain or elaborate anything.

replies.body:
The 2950 RP bundle you're mentioning gives you 10 augmented caches and a single gemstone (purple crystal). These are only available for a limited time, and after they're gone, you'll have to get gemstones through normal hextech chests at random again. 

I recommend checking out our [PROJECT: DISRUPTION FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) for complete deets on this event. Hit me up if you have any questions.
